name: Cube Heroes (itch)
description:
Shuffle to match spells and monsters! Clear all levels and defeat the final boss!

Cube Heroes is a magic cube roguelite. Download the free demo below and leave feedback if possible. Inspired by Slice & Dice.

Alpha price: $4.99

Features:

  • Puzzle style gameplay with roguelite elements
  • Many abilities and enemies
  • Every new session is unique
  • Character upgrades (not yet implemented)

>> Click here to download the demo (Alpha 0.01a)
